rules_text:
Multikicker {2}{U} [i](You may pay an additional {2}{U} any number of times as you cast this spell.)[/i]
When Vallen Drakespeaker enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying onto the battlefield for each time it was kicked.
Vallen Drakespeaker gets +1/+1 for each creature with flying you control.
